Title: 920 - Pub/Sub and Reactive Programming
Description: How to use Pub/Sub and Reactive Programming in Blazor
Tip: Add a topic to every message object

Summary.What: Treat every event as a message with a topic, avoid doing a direct function call to another component.
Summary.Why: Pub/Sub promotes loose coupling. The Message object simplifies recording/playback scenarios and testing.
Summary.How: Use a Topic / Message structure to share event data, then leverage the BlazorComponentBus service
